attributes.action: Resign and request a general Election in the best interest of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is not elected. We wanted labour out when we pushed for Blair to be out. We now understand Mr.Brown and his government is compounding problems we have in the UK and request he understand the gravity of which the UK values it's identity and culture. We do not believe this current labour leadership have the best interests of the UK as a priority.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
